commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas81c11f3"

diff:
"81c11f3 Removing New Tab button.
diff --git a/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml b/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
index 2caa7c7..be920bb 100644
--- a/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
+++ b/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
@@ -79,7 +79,6 @@
           </xul:menupopup>
 
           <xul:tabs class="tabbrowser-tabs" closebutton="true" flex="1"
-                    tooltiptextnew="&newTabButton.tooltip;"
                     onclick="this.parentNode.parentNode.parentNode.onTabClick(event);"
                     ondragover="nsDragAndDrop.dragOver(event, this.parentNode.parentNode.parentNode);
                                 event.stopPropagation();"
"
